info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 4 at 10:44AM CDT until June 7 at 7:39PM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas...
Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties.
Neosho River near Erie affecting Neosho County.
Neosho River near Chanute affecting Neosho and Allen Counties.
Neosho River at Iola affecting Allen County.
Neosho River near Parsons affecting Neosho and Labette Counties.
Neosho River at Oswego affecting Labette and Cherokee Counties.
Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...
Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Neosho River at Oswego.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 22.5 feet, Riverside Park Drive floods from east of Xavier Road, just south of the river gage bridge, to 100 yards east towards the water plant.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 22.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING
